metadata.title: CVE-2018-7714 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The validateInputImageSize function inmodules/imgcodecs/src/loadsave.cpp in OpenCV 3.4.1 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (assertion failure) because (pixels <=(1<<30)) may be false. Note: “OpenCV CV_Assert is not an assertion (C-likeassert()), it is regular C++ exception which can raised in case of invalidor non-supported parameters.”

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
